import React from 'react' import 'semantic-ui-css/semantic.min.css' import { Menu, Segment,Container } from 'semantic-ui-react' import SignIn from '../pages/SignIn' import SignOut from '../pages/SignOut' export default function navi() { const [isAuthenticated, setAuthenticated] = userState(true) function handleSignOut(){ setAuthenticated(false) } function handleSignIn(){ setAuthenticated(true) } return (
{isAuthenticated?:}
) }
